document_data.name: Drivvin Freth
document_data.mainbody: '''Drivvin Freth''' was the [[drow]] archmage of [[House Freth]] inside [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Drivvin was the main advisor of his sister [[Erelal Freth]] in her plans to conquer all Undermountain, especially against [[House Auvryndar]]. Usually he resided inside [[Spiderwatch Keep]], the main Freth headquarters in the [[Maze Level]] with his sister.
document_data.History: Around the [[1492 DR|Year of Three Ships Sailing, 1492 DR]] after a series of very devastating battles, Drivvin was busy with devising a way to summon a [[goristo]] in order to impress the [[minotaur]]s that were enemies of House Freth, by convincing them that he had summoned an envoy of [[Baphomet]] and they must obey him. However he knew he did not have the magical abilities to succeed alone. [[Tendra Nightblade]] and [[Mateen Shadowdusk]] offered him the help of [[Halaster Blackcloak]] himself in the matter in exchange for Drivvin becoming his next assistant. Drivvin was conflicted because he didn't want abandon his House to go with Halaster.
